title: LIVE WHAT YOU LOVE
short_description: You see it everywhere: Matcha tea, matcha ice cream, matcha milk. Matcha smoothies. Matcha pudding. First appearing internationally on the menus of Japanese restaurants and the shelves of Japanese supermarkets, the green of matcha now lines the pages of food bloggers worldwide and holds a permanent place in many hearts and pantries for its subtle, refreshing sweetness.
seo_description: Discover the age-old history of matcha, a trendy drink with roots in the spiritual Japanese art of tea and the writings of ancient Chinese sages.
